cards.rules_text:
A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle.
{B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

A deck can have any number of cards named Brightborn Apostle.
{W}, Sacrifice six creatures named Brightborn Apostle: Search your library for an Angel creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.special_text:
[+2]: Mill cards until you mill a land card. Return up to one card milled this way to your hand.
[-3]: Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It becomes a 6/6 green Spirit creature with trample. It's still a land.
[-9]: You get an emblem with “{BG}: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.”

cards.rules_text: Return target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand. If you controlled that permanent, surveil 2.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The people of this world are obsessed with divinity. If I can imitate it, I will garner their faith.”
—Josiah[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may have each player discard a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have one or fewer cards in hand, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. It gains menace until end of turn.
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, untap it and you gain 1 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Faith in a higher cause guides all who seek redemption.”
—Naqai[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{1}, {T}: Draw two cards, then exile a card from your hand.
{2}, {T}, Seal 4: Create a 4/4 Angel creature token with flying. [i](To seal 4, exile up to four cards with four or more card types among them from your graveyard.)[/i]
{3}, {T}: If there are six or more card types among cards exiled with Engine of Our Eden, you win the game.

When this enchantment enters, each creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature you controlled died this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Sinners and sinless alike burned in demonic hellfire. All the angels did was look away.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, surveil 2.
Once during each of your turns, rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast, you may seal X, where X is that spell's mana value. [i](To seal X, exile up to X cards with X or more card types among them from your graveyard.)[/i]

Flying
Whenever another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The opulence of an angel with none of the compassion.[/i]

Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, you gain 1 life.

cards.rules_text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Your faith is strong. You just placed it in the wrong divinity.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Odeon enters, return up to one target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Odeon.
Surpass {7}{W} [i]({7}{W}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
When this creature transforms into Odeon, Bloom of Sin, return up to three target creature cards with total mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Whenever a creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

• Devour Tender Flesh deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Devour Tender Flesh deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
Target creature gets -666/-666 until end of turn.

Convoke [i](Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)[/i]
Exile the top five cards of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn. You may cast a spell with mana value X or less from among them, where X is the number of creatures that convoked this spell.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.
Each opponent sacrifices a nonland permanent with mana value greater than the discarded card or sacrificed permanent and a nonland permanent with mana value less than the discarded card or sacrificed permanent.
